author: sebor
msg: * ctype.cpp (main): Parenthesized a call to ctype::toupper() to avoid
errors when the symbol is shadowed by a macro defined in libc header(s)
as happens to be the case with gcc 4 on Darwin.

author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes TAPESTRY-1753.  required object checking was using dojo.lang.arrayLike instead of just instanceof Array

author: sebor
msg: overload of tolower() to avoid errors when the symbol is #defined
as a macro in libc header(s) as is the case with gcc 4 on Darwin.
